content: I’ve tried three times to read Infinite Jest, because I’m a writer and it often seems like there’s an unspoken cultural assumption that you can’t be a real writer, a serious writer, unless you’ve read it. But yeah — while I do like a lot of his essays, his fiction has never resonated with me either, and I don’t get the cult of DFW at all. Thanks for writing this — you come to it with a perspective that I, as a straight white cis male, do not have, and I found it enlightening.
